languages.text: "На твоем месте я бы бросил{mf||а} пастырство и вернул{mf|ся|ась} к пиратству".
"If I were you, I would swear off preaching and go back to piracy."
languages.original_text: "На твоем месте я бы бросил{mf||а} пастырство и вернул{mf|ся|ась} к пиратству".

traits.locale_text: "If I were you I would swear off preaching and go back to piracy."
"If I were you I would swear off preaching and go back to piracy."

languages.text: “如果我是你，我就不当什么牧师了，回去当海盗。”
languages.original_text: "If I were you, I would swear off preaching and go back to piracy."

traits.locale_text: “如果我是你，我就不当什么牧师了，回去当海盗。”

languages.text: 「私なら、説教をやめて海賊に戻る」
languages.original_text: "If I were you, I would swear off preaching and go back to piracy."

traits.locale_text: 「私なら、説教をやめて海賊に戻る」

languages.text: «Si fuera usted, dejaría de predicar y volvería a la piratería».
languages.original_text: "If I were you, I would swear off preaching and go back to piracy."

traits.locale_text: «Si fuera usted, dejaría de predicar y volvería a la piratería».

languages.text: "Ich an Eurer Stelle würde der Priesterei abschwören und wieder Pirat werden."
languages.original_text: "If I were you, I would swear off preaching and go back to piracy."

traits.locale_text: "Ich an Eurer Stelle würde der Priesterei abschwören und wieder Pirat werden."

languages.text: « Si j'étais vous, je laisserais tomber les sermons et je me remettrais à la piraterie. »
languages.original_text: "If I were you, I would swear off preaching and go back to piracy."

traits.locale_text: « Si j'étais vous, je laisserais tomber les sermons et je me remettrais à la piraterie. »

languages.text: "Senin yerinde olsam vaizliği bir kenara atar, korsanlığa geri dönerdim."
languages.original_text: "If I were you, I would swear off preaching and go back to piracy."

traits.locale_text: "Senin yerinde olsam vaizliği bir kenara atar, korsanlığa geri dönerdim."
